title: Looking for mordekaiser main s2
body:
I am very interested in finding a morde main that's s2 or s1. I know the potential and I want it. I main akali 320k M points. Mid lane. I think me and you will get along just nicely. 

Thanks.

replies.body: I'm in series for S1 and I'm a morde main.  No smurf account, started playing late season 5, 450k in morde, 58% win rate across hundreds of games including all the losses when I was god awful when I first started last year.
What has you interested in finding that type of player?  What is it your looking for out of a teammate that would play him?

> [{quoted}](name=Zeox101,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=7uFJempP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-03T14:43:15.998+0000)
>
> https://www.twitch.tv/thekingofelohell

too bad theirs a masters that plays morde. feelsbad
Sorry i dont play Morde now. Ill try back once he gets a much deserved rework

> [{quoted}](name=Mordepool,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=7uFJempP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-03T07:24:15.850+0000)
>
> Sorry i dont play Morde now. Ill try back once he gets a much deserved rework

Slave meta, don't come back. If you think you can't play him because he isn't op then get lost, akali isn't op. I play her and make her op because people suck and I know her mechanics.
